children.description:
Based on the previous action, it seems that there was an error while trying to track the package using Pridnestrovie Post. Since we have already tried that action and it failed, we should try a different approach.

Thought: Let's try using the Pack & Send reference number with a different function to get the tracking details.

Action: Call the 'api_tracking_for_pack_send' function with the reference number 'YZA890'.

It appears that there was an error again while trying to track the package using Pack & Send. Since both attempts to track the packages have failed, we are unable to proceed with the task in the current state.

Action: Call the 'Finish' function to give up and restart the task.

Based on the previous action and its failure, it seems that calling the "api_tracking_for_pack_send" function with the reference number "YZA890" resulted in a bad request error. To avoid repeating the same failed action, I should try a different approach.

Thought:
1. Since the pack_send API did not provide the tracking details, I should try using the "get_track_info_for_pridnestrovie_post" function to check the status of the package sent through Pridnestrovie Post.
2. I will call the "get_track_info_for_pridnestrovie_post" function with the tracking number "RB413450335SG" to retrieve the tracking information.

Action:
I will call the function "get_track_info_for_pridnestrovie_post" with the tracking number "RB413450335SG".

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart.
